title: Just got a weird email?
body:
Okay, so i stopped playing league around last year in december, and i just got an email from "riotgames" (im unsure if it's a real email) And basically it says i've been banned until the year 9002. If this IS a real email, i would like riot to check the IP connections to my account please. I will check my accounts match history to see if anything shady is going on.

EDIT: Lo and behold there are alot of matches with high kills and low deaths. apparently there were 10 matches played with a guy named YolisHD so i'm guessing this guy's friend has hacked me. here's my NA.OP.GG profile as evidence. http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=kingshiift

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, but due to the nature of sensitive account information we can't really share anything on the boards.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'd be happy to further clarify what's going on.  We'll respond asap!

Can you send an email to the email I have on account and check into mines as well. I sent a support ticket but I am thoroughly confused as to how someone got access to my account.

Getting your account compromised is often due to one or more of a few things;

* Logging into a public or friend's computer that has a keylogger
* Sharing part or all of your login information for an illegal service like boosting
* Visiting shady websites that phish your information one way or another
* Using a weak password or no intrusion prevention/antivirus software
* Sharing  your information with a friend who did the above

I'd suggest checking out the [Protecting Your Account article here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) for info on preventing this from happening, and the [Recovering Your Account article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) if it does happen.
